titleStmt.title: State-worthies, or, The states-men and favourites of England since the reformation their prudence and policies, successes and miscarriages, advancements and falls, during the reigns of King Henry VIII, King Edward VI, Queen Mary, Queen Elizabeth, King James, King Charles I.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, David, 1635-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Milbourne for Samuel Speed ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
First ed. Published 1665 with title: The statesmen and favourites of England since the reformation.
